data.text: @davidpercival42 @Joeytaylor123 From what I keep hearing he's playing injured because of Dabos situation so you can hardly fault the guy. I think he puts in a quality cross tbh

@davidpercival42 @Joeytaylor123 He isn't asking for Kanes thoughts on his opinion, he's stating what he thinks which he's entitled to and I think he's right, Kanes gone off the boil since Bournemouth.

@davidpercival42 I'm hardly slagging him off, I just think he had a tough start, came good and recent performances have gone back to what he was like when he joined. I've played abit to know a decent player when I see one.
@davidpercival42 @Joeytaylor123 He's perfectly entitled to make an opinion about a player on twitter.

@Joeytaylor123 let me just bust your bubble ere m8 .if you was a perfect player you'd be out on that pitch playing for city .its easy for us all to moan about players .do they really care what you or I think?  answer is no no no .why would they
@RobOMalley8 Hopefully soon so Kane picks up his form 🤣🤣🤣
@Joeytaylor123 We must be due another wave/variant soon but probably in the winter
@davidpercival42 Not ganging up, but last night was another poor performance. I can count on both hands how many poor games he has had.
@Joeytaylor123 sheaf gets abused the vic cus he ain't scoring every week now waghorn bidwell  and kane .
@Joeytaylor123 why is there fans ganging up on individual  players at the club .? whats it all about ?
